p: From 10 g of A. virginicus dried samples, five extracts were obtained including total (T-Anvi), hexane (H-Anvi), ethyl acetate (E-Anvi), butanol (B-Anvi), and water (W-Anvi) extracts. The yield of T-Anvi is 0.98 g (9.8%), followed by E-Anvi (0.32 g, 3.2%), H-Anvi (0.16 g, 1.6%), B-Anvi (0.12 g, 1.2%), and W-Anvi (0.11 g, 1.1%) ( Table 1).
